DESCRIPTION: Fuse different fragments to make an animated card
FUSE_DESC: The fusion lab is where Sofi experiments and creates new stuff for the players. Exciting features get life here.
FUSE_DESC2: <:_:979009081325019156> Animated : The frags that are collected using pulls are then fused here to make an animated card. You need all the 8 fragments of a character to make it animated.
FUSE_DESC3: <:_:979009081325019156> Levelling: Fuse duplicates to earn upgrade points for your card
FUSE_DESC4: <:_:979009081325019156> Versions : Use elixir with your card to get a new version
FUSE_DESC5: <:_:979009081325019156> Multi: Test your luck to get duo or trio cards
FRAG_INFO: `Once 100 Versions of a GIF are fused, its fragments will stop spawning. Use the fragments or trade before they become useless.
FUSE_CONFIRM: > Are you sure want to convert {{charName}} to animated version?
FUSE_CONFIRM2: > The process will consume `8` fragments and is irreversible
FUSE_CONFIRM3:
> You will receive animated version from gen 1-100
> Gens do not repeat in case of animated cards
ALL_FUSED: There are already 100 animated versions of the card in circulation
NAME: Name
